title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“RAW SEWAGE AND FOOD—The dread of cholera has complete cured people of lobster eating. Two thousand were thrown overboard the other day at Gloucester, Mass.” [From Scientific American, July 1999, quoting the July 1869 issue. Submitted by Israel Wilenitz, E. Setauket, NY].
